mankell first published in swedish in 2000 under the title vindens son ( son of the wind ) .	children of their city ( swedish : barn av sin stad ) is a 1962 novel by swedish author per anders fogelström .	missing ( swedish : saknad ) is a 2000 crime fiction novel by swedish author karin alvtegen .	the troubled man ( swedish : den orolige mannen ) is a crime fiction novel by swedish author henning mankell , featuring police inspector kurt wallander .

shatner and ( uncredited ) science fiction author ron goulart .	of men and monsters is a science fiction novel by american writer william tenn , published in june 1968 as a paperback by ballantine books .	diaspora is a hard science fiction novel by the australian writer greg egan which first appeared in print in 1997 .	my brother 's keeper is a 1982 science fiction novel by charles sheffield , published as a paperback original by ace books in 1982 .	ghoul , goblin is a hardback graphic novel written by science fiction and fantasy author jim butcher and illustrated by joseph cooper .	war cry is a hardback graphic novel written by science fiction and fantasy author jim butcher and illustrated by carlos gomez .	the outpost is a science fiction novel by american writer mike resnick , first published as hardback by tor books in may 2001 , followed by paperback edition in august 2002 .	options is a 1975 absurdist science fiction novel by robert sheckley , published in paperback by pyramid books .	les fourmis ( english : the ants ) is a 1991 science fiction novel by french writer bernard werber .	web is a science fiction novel written by the english science fiction author john wyndham .	the king 's general is a novel , published in 1946 , by english author and playwright daphne du maurier .	pollard is the debut novel of laura beatty , first published in hardback in 2008 by chatto windus and the following year in paperback by vintage books .	built for trouble , by american novelist al fray , was published in 1958 as a dell ( paperback ) first edition .	the general of the dead army ( albanian : gjenerali i ushtrisë së vdekur ) is a 1963 novel by the albanian writer ismail kadare .	the last english king ( 1997 ) is a historical novel by english writer julian rathbone .	autobiografía del general franco ( 1992 ) ( english , autobiography of general franco ) is a novel by manuel vázquez montalbán .	come back for more , by american novelist al fray , was published in 1958 as a dell ( paperback ) first edition .	avana ivan ( english : is that him ? )

published in 1963 , in the united kingdom by chatto windus , london .	the dark eyes of london is a crime novel by the british writer edgar wallace which was first published in 1924 .	montmorency is a crime novel and thriller set in victorian era london , written by eleanor updale and published by scholastic in 2003 .	london boulevard is a 2010 british independent crime noir film released in the united kingdom on 26 november 2010 .	the white family is a novel by english author maggie gee , published in 2002 in london by saqi books .	the god child is a crime novel by english author paul sayer published in 1996 .	the great fire of london is a novel by the english author peter ackroyd .	the london eye mystery is a children 's mystery novel by english author siobhan dowd .	disordered minds ( 2003 ) is a crime novel by english writer minette walters .	the sculptress ( 1993 ) is a crime novel by english writer minette walters .	moon over soho is the second novel in the rivers of london series by english author ben aaronovitch .	the tinder box ( 1999 ) is a crime novella by english writer minette walters .	the hanging tree is the sixth novel in the rivers of london series by english author ben aaronovitch .	whispers under ground 1 is the third novel in the rivers of london series by english author ben aaronovitch , published 2012 by gollancz .	the dark room ( 1995 ) is a crime is the fourth novel in the rivers of london series by english author ben aaronovitch , published 2013 by gollancz .	foxglove summer is the fifth novel in the rivers of london series by english author the foundationseries .	the time museum is a big finish productions audiobook based on the long-running british science fiction television series doctor who .	the power of six is the second book in the mccaffrey , the first book in `` the tower and the hive '' series ( also known as `` the rowan '' series ) .	diaspora is a hard science fiction novel by the australian writer greg egan which first appeared in print in 1997 .	sixty days and counting ( 2007 ) is the third book in the hard science fiction science in the capital trilogy by kim stanley robinson .	the worthing saga ( 1990 ) is a science fiction book by american writer orson scott card , set in the worthing series .	glory road is a science fantasy novel by american writer robert a. heinlein , originally serialized in the magazine of fantasy science fiction ( july september 1963 ) and published in hardcover the same year .	1635 : the eastern front is an alternate history novel by eric flint in the 1632 series , first edition and in august 2005 in paperback edition .	the shadow in the north ( 1986 ) is a book by the english author philip pullman .	the tiger in the well ( 1990 ) is a book by the english author philip pullman .	me and you ( italian : io e te ) is a novel by niccolò ammaniti .
blast off at woomera is a children 's science fiction novel , the first in the chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	nearly neptune is a juvenile science fiction novel by american writer hugh walters , the twelfth in his chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	expedition venus is a juvenile science fiction novel , the fifth in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	destination mars is a juvenile science fiction novel , the sixth in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	journey to jupiter is a juvenile science fiction novel , the eighth in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	tony hale , space detective is a juvenile science fiction novel , the fifteenth in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	the domes of pico is a juvenile science fiction novel , the second in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	mission to mercury is a juvenile science fiction novel , the ninth in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	moon base one is a young adult science fiction novel , the fourth in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	operation columbus is a juvenile science fiction novel , the third in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	the mohole mystery is a juvenile science fiction novel , the eleventh in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	venus plus x is a science fiction novel by american writer theodore sturgeon , published in 1960 .	the big u ( 1984 ) is a novel by american writer neal stephenson .	diaspora is a hard science fiction novel by the australian writer greg egan which first appeared in print in 1997 .	the hate u give is a young adult novel by angie thomas .	orphan x is a 2016 thriller novel written by gregg hurwitz .	i am princess x is a 2015 book by cherie priest .	fire star is a 2005 novel by an english author , chris d'lacey .	icefire is a 2003 children 's fantasy novel by english author chris d'lacey .	me and you ( italian : io e te ) is a novel by niccolò ammaniti .
